Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,364Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 515

entry.title: No Pain in Death
entry.summary:
Author: Bastet_Case

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,531Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 553

Summary: In a world full of the supernatural, the Bat family are creatures of the night and protectors of both human and supernatural.When their lives brush those of Danny Fenton and Marinette Dupain-Cheng, they think little of the two seemingly unconnected teens from opposite sides of the world. But the young half ghost and guardian are two sides of a coin, chosen champions of life and death in a game they don’t yet know. And something from the shadows is hunting them both.Will the Bats realise they are needed before it’s too late?

entry.title: I don't need to see to find you
entry.summary:
Author: Assassinscred

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,638Chapters: 27/?Kudos: 1,816

Summary: Marinette and Damian were raised to be married one day. They were the culmination of two powerful bloodlines. He is the next head of the League of Assassins and she's the next Grand guardian of the miraculous.But great plans never hold up well under first contact with the enemy. With a coup and an acid attack, Marinette finds herself without the boy she grew up with, unable to see the world, and with a new family to teach her how to function without the use of her eyes while waiting to be called back to her betrothed's side.

entry.title: The Right Wrong Place In The Right Wrong Time
entry.summary:
Author: Intercoursefluids

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,013Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 382

Summary: Soulmates are rare. Everyone has one, but *meeting* your soulmate is rare. In order to meet your soulmate, you need to shift. In order to shift, you need to be perfectly in sync with your soulmate. Your hearts need to beat in sync, your movements need to be in sync, perfectly mirroring one another. A blink, a *twitch* could be the difference between meeting your soulmate and not.Damian's soulmate shifts to him at the most awkward time possible.

entry.title: The Future is Ahead of Us, Not Set in Stone
entry.summary:
Author: Zi_Xi_Zy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,643Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 245

Summary: In her final year of lycée, Marinette moves to Gotham for various reasons. Meanwhile, Damian Wayne, in his last year of high school, is ready to leave the Robin mantle behind and follow his own path away from his vigilante family.But as he steps away from one destiny, another reveals itself—one tied to the Miraculous, to the power of restoration, and to the girl who was never meant to wield the Ladybug Miraculous in the first place.When Marinette and Damian meet, it becomes undeniable: the roles they were forced into were never meant for them. She was born for the Black Cat. He was made for the Ladybug. And together, they must uncover the truth behind the Miraculous, the Order, and their own tangled legacies before it’s too late.

entry.title: Step into the Light
entry.summary:
Author: EditorOfEverything

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,793Chapters: 11/20Kudos: 691

Summary: A year after the defeat of Hawkmoth, Marinette is out of school, Guardian of the Miraculous, and unable to move on.When the Order challenges her titles, Marinette won’t give up without a fight. She arrives at the Order, determined to stay a Guardian and help the Order reclaim their place in the world—all while carrying the weight of her new power and responsibilities. Fortunately, Marinette has luck on her side.Damian Wayne is lost.He is nineteen, out of school, and feels out of place in his life. With no clear path forward, Damian follows his mother back to the League of Assassins to bury his past once and for all. Of course, nothing ever goes to plan.Upon learning that an ancient, magical organization has returned and is demanding his presence as the Demon Head, Damian makes the decision to accept his place in the League—making an enemy of his mother.Convinced they can reform their factions with each other’s help, Marinette and Damian must get through new enemies, old oaths, and their own building feelings—all while avoiding their fast-approaching deadline to be Soul Bound.Alone, it would be too much for anyone to handle. Together, they’ll face it all.

entry.title: We Should have Stayed in Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: skhwriter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 94,818Chapters: 31/?Kudos: 8,501

Summary: The students of Gotham Academy were confused. It was International Friendship Week, and it was Gotham’s turn to host. Except no one wanted Gotham to host, not even Gotham! So the Directors of the Friendship Conference decided that it was in everybody’s best interest to skip the City of Crime and go straight to the City of Lights. Everyone thought that it was the perfect idea! Except for Paris. The Gothamites couldn’t help but laugh and scoff at the Parisians insistence that Gotham would be a much safer place than Paris, and nothing should change. And everyone, even one Damian Wayne, was thrilled when the petition went through, and they boarded the plane for Paris.And then…a giant baby…tried to eat the Eiffel Tower…they should have stayed in Gotham.
